summary: This bill, known as the "Providing Appropriate Recognition and Treatment Needed to Enhance Relations with ASEAN Act of 2025" or the "PARTNER with ASEAN Act of 2025," aims to strengthen relations between the United States and the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN). It mandates the extension of diplomatic privileges and immunities to ASEAN, similar to those enjoyed by other international organizations. The President is authorized to implement the provisions under specific terms and conditions.
